description: This file defines a module for computed properties in Dojo framework, including functions for observing property changes and computing derived properties based on other stateful properties.

methods.name: watch
methods.description: Sets up observation on a property of a dojo/Stateful object, calling a callback on change.

methods.name: getProps
methods.description: Retrieves current values of specified properties from a list of stateful objects.

methods.name: removeHandles
methods.description: Removes a list of handles by calling their remove method.

methods.name: computed
methods.description: Creates a computed property that depends on other stateful properties, updating when dependencies change.
